name: Pumpkin boy
description: One day on Halloween, Jorge decided to dress up as Jack the pumpkin for the festival but he didn't expect that an evil witch would appear and curse him, turning him into a pumpkin, thus spreading out a bunch of curses throughout Jorge's house. Jorge's goal is to erase all the curses that are scattered into the house, while he escapes from his dad that is trying to turn him into Jack-O'-Lantern.
